Title: Provides for coordination between the department of health and the state long-term care ombudsman regarding residential health care facilities
Summary: Provides for coordination between the department of health and the state long-term care ombudsman regarding residential health care facilities, including such facilities' compliance with state and federal law, and histories of complaints.
LawCode: Amd ยง2803, Pub Health L; amd ยง218, Eld L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the elder law, in relation to coordination between the department of health and the state long-term care ombudsman regarding residential health care facilities
